subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: David Lee, who was left off the All-Star team, finished with 29 points and 18 rebounds, but the Knicks fell short against Chris Bosh and the Toronto Raptors.
snippet: David Lee, who was left off the All-Star team, finished with 29 points and 18 rebounds, but the Knicks fell short against Chris Bosh and the Toronto Raptors.
